explains: n. 管理不善；处置失当

sentences.en: In?communities?north?of?Denver,?residents?are?pitching?in?to?help?teachers?and administrators?as?the?Vrain?school?District?tries?to?solve?a?$13.8 million budget shortage blamed on mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 在丹佛北部的社区，Vrain 学区正努力解决因管理不善而造成的1380万美元的预算短缺问题，那里的居民们也正在积极帮助教师和管理人员。

sentences.en: His gross mismanagement left the company desperately in need of restructuring.
sentences.cn: 他处理事务的严重不当使得公司急需重组。

sentences.en: In communities north of Denver, residents are pitching in to help teachers and administrators as the Vrain school District tries to solve a $13.8 million budget shortage blamed on mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 在丹佛市北部的社区，Vrain 学区正试图填补由于管理不当导致的1380万美元的预算空缺，而居民们正在尽力帮助学校的教师和管理人员。
